p: The total genome size of A. trifoliatus was 1,56,716 bp, containing an large single-copy (LSC) region of 86,672 bp, a small single-copy (SSC) region of 18,174 bp, and a pair of IRs region of 25,935 bp. A total of 134 genes were predicted, including 89 protein-coding genes, 37 tRNA genes, and eight rRNA genes, and the GC content was 38.02%.
